description:
Shiina has invited Yuto, Haruka, and the others to a hot spring trip.  Haruka jumps at the chance as this is her first time going on a trip with Friends.  While at the springs Yuto springs a surprise on Haruko with the chance of making this trip the best trip ever.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Want To Come With You...
一緒に, いきたいです......
